titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University UTS MS Arab. 11: Hādhā Kitāb Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn.

notesStmt.note: 1. f. 1v-93r: Hādhā Kitāb Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn -- 2. f. 94-95r: Mabdaʼ al-sulūk dar iṣlāḥ-i qulūb

msContents.summary: Collection of Prophetic supplications with extensive marginal annotations followed by a short portion of a treatise regarding Naqshbandī Sufism.

msItem.title: Hādhā Kitāb Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn.
هذا كتاب حصن الحصين من كلام سيد المرسلين

author.name: Arabic Manuscripts Collection (Burke Library at Union Theological Seminary)

respStmt.persName: Tatavī, Muḥammad Fāz̤il ibn Abū al-Faz̤l, active 1698
تتوى، محمد فاضل بن ابو الفضل،

msItem.title: Hādhā Kitāb Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn.

supportDesc.extent: ii, 95, ii leaves : 235 x 125 (132 x 65) mm, bound to 242 x 142 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed. Extensive marginalia.

binding.p: Rebound in green textile with flap (Type II); plain paper doublure.

origin.p: Copy completed in Shawwāl 1109 AH (April 1698) by Muḥammad Fāz̤il? ibn Abū al-Faz̤l al-Tatavī (f. 92v).

history.provenance: Formerly owned by ʻAbd al-Rashīd Jahānʹābādī (notes in ink, f. 1r, 93v)
Formerly owned by Nūr al-Dīn Darvīsh in [12]79 AH, probably the same person as the waqf donor (stamp f. 1r-2r).
Given as a pious endowment (waqf) by Yūsuf Muḥammad Nūr al-Dīn in 1279 A.H. (1863 CE) (note on f. 1r)
